translation.en: [man in French] I think the word captain is…
Is above all a feeling of pride.
[man in Portuguese] You give that responsibility only to people you trust.
translation.de: Man gibt diese Verantwortung nur Personen, denen man vertraut.

translation.en: [man in Croatian] You need to be your manager's right hand.
translation.de: Man ist die rechte Hand des Managers.

translation.en: [man in Arabic] A good player does not always make a good leader or captain.
translation.de: Ein guter Spieler ist nicht sofort ein guter Anführer oder Kapitän.

translation.en: [man 1 in English] It's the best thing that can happen to anyone.
translation.de: Es ist das Beste, was einem passieren kann.

translation.en: [man 2] Wearing the captain band,
translation.de: Mit der Kapitänsbinde zeigt man keine Angst,

translation.en: you can't show fear. You can't show nerves.
translation.de: Mit der Kapitänsbinde zeigt man keine Angst, keine Nerven.

translation.en: Silencing them is gonna feel good, eh?
I work hard for you. You work hard for me.
translation.de: Ich arbeite für euch und ihr für mich.

translation.en: [Blake] We wanna go to the World Cup.
[Maatouk in Arabic] Everyone's counting on us.
[Modrić in Croatian] It will be emotional and difficult.
translation.de: Es wird emotional und schwer werden.

translation.en: [Aubameyang in French] It's a whole country behind you.
translation.de: Ein ganzes Land steht hinter einem.

translation.en: -[in Jamaican Patois] Think I like losing? -[in Croatian] Clear it.
translation.de: Ich verliere gern? Mach den Raum frei.

translation.en: [Silva in Portuguese] I am getting goosebumps.
We're going to Qatar!
[Modrić in Croatian] I don't like to talk about myself as if I'm bragging,
translation.de: Ich rede nicht gern über mich, als würde ich prahlen…

translation.en: but I always had the feeling I was a leader.
translation.de: Ich hatte stets das Gefühl, ein Anführer zu sein.

translation.en: [man 1 in French] Good evening, everyone.
After a busy night of African qualifiers for the World Cup 2022 in Qatar…
translation.de: Nach einer Nacht mit Qualifikanten aus Afrika für die WM 2022

translation.en: …we're back focusing on the Panthers of Gabon
translation.de: sind wir jetzt zurück bei den Panthern aus Gabun,

translation.en: whose campaign has just gotten underway against Libya.
Gabon scored first.
[man 2] It's a nice combination from Gabon.
And it's in off the post.
translation.de: Und er ist vom Pfosten drin.

translation.en: The Gabonese defense was all over the place.
translation.de: Die Verteidigung von Gabun war einfach chaotisch.

translation.en: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang with the strike!
Just a few seconds left in this game.
A cross into the box. The header!
translation.de: Ein Pass in den Strafraum. Der Kopfball!

translation.en: And it's Libya in the final minute
translation.de: Und dann holt Libyen in der letzten Minute

translation.en: that take the lead.
Gabon crack at the end of the game.
translation.de: Gabun hat es am Ende vergeigt.

translation.en: [reporter] It was a big upset. Libya gaining a shock win.
translation.de: Es war echt überraschend, dass Libyen gewonnen hat.

translation.en: [Aubameyang] I was pissed off.
We were all disappointed.
It's our fault.
It's not even the opponent. It's us.
I don't want to miss out.
[reporter] Will Aubameyang ever get the chance to play at a World Cup?
translation.de: Wird Aubameyang je um die Weltmeisterschaft spielen können?

translation.en: For sure he belongs on that stage, but do Gabon?
translation.de: Er gehört sicherlich auf diese Bühne… TRAININGSLAGER VON GABUN …aber auch Gabun?

translation.en: [Aubameyang] I was born in France, but I grew up like an African.
translation.de: Ich wurde in Frankreich geboren, aber wuchs wie ein Afrikaner auf.

translation.en: People ask me the question, "Why?"
"Why did you choose Gabon?"
My father.
The first memory in my head,
I was very small.
My father was playing.
He scored a goal.
[commentator] Oh, the goal of Aubame!
Wow. It was incredible how many people were cheering.
translation.de: Es war unglaublich, wie viele jubelten.

translation.en: I was thinking, "What's going on?"
It was a very powerful moment.
We scored some goals tonight, which felt good for the team.
translation.de: Wir haben heute Tore geschossen, was toll für das Team war.

translation.en: The most important thing is winning.
I think from that point on,
he was my role model.
[man] I like fashion, so does Pierre-Emerick.
In the evening, when you put on something like this.
translation.de: Wenn man abends so etwas anzieht…

translation.en: Something like this. Whoo!
When he sees this, Pierre-Emerick, he'll want to steal it from me.
translation.de: Wenn er das sieht, Pierre-Emerick, will er es klauen.

translation.en: Well, no stealing.
It's for me. [laughs]
I realized he had something when he was about five years old.
translation.de: Ich erkannte, dass er als Fünfjähriger etwas hatte.

translation.en: We started playing football, and I had the ball.
translation.de: Wir spielten zusammen Fußball, und ich hatte den Ball.

translation.en: Very quickly, he takes the ball, accelerates, and shoots.
translation.de: Er holte sich sehr schnell den Ball, beschleunigte und schoss.

translation.en: I said, "Wow. He has something."
As I'd already been a professional footballer,
I had seen a lot of physical duels.
translation.de: hatte ich schon einige Zweikämpfe gesehen.

translation.en: [commentator 1] Aubame.
[laughs] Playing with my father…
[commentator 2] Look at Aubame. Looking a little like Michael Jackson.
translation.de: Schau mal Aubame an. Er sieht wie Michael Jackson aus.

translation.en: …it was hard.
We did a lot of one-on-ones.
There were no fouls, so it was very physical. [laughs]
translation.de: Es gab keine Fouls, nur sehr viel Körperkontakt.

translation.en: [man] His father educated him according to the morals of a patrilineal society
translation.de: Sein Vater brachte ihm die moralischen Standards einer patrilinealen Gesellschaft bei, weil er dem Stamm der Fang angehört.

translation.en: because he belongs to the Fang tribe.
translation.de: einer patrilinealen Gesellschaft bei, weil er dem Stamm der Fang angehört.

translation.en: It is a society where the concept of the father is very strong
translation.de: Es ist eine Gesellschaft, wo der Vater im Mittelpunkt steht,

translation.en: with extremely rigorous values.
Maybe it was those values, those cultural elements,
translation.de: Vielleicht sind es diese Werte, diese kulturellen Elemente,

translation.en: that led him to make the choices he made.
translation.de: die ihn zu diesen Entscheidungen geführt haben.

translation.en: -He'd fall, but we kept playing. -"Never complain."
translation.de: -Er fiel, aber wir spielten weiter. -"Beschwer dich nie."

translation.en: [Pierre-François] You couldn't say, "That's wrong."
If you say that, I get mad.
"Never complain. Get back up and continue."
translation.de: "Beschwer dich nie, steh wieder auf und mach weiter."

translation.en: It was an African education.
The hard way,
but in France.
So…
-You see what you did? So good. -[laughing]
So, so good.
[Aubameyang] My dad was very hard on me,
translation.de: Mein Vater war hart zu mir,

translation.en: but that's what makes me strong today.
translation.de: aber das macht mich heute stark.

translation.en: [Pierre-François] When I watched him play,
I could only go now and again, and I would turn up by surprise.
translation.de: und das konnte ich nur selten, dann immer überraschend.

translation.en: I never celebrated his goals.
When he did score, he would look to me, and I'd just stay like this.
translation.de: Wenn er mal traf, schaute er zu mir, und ich war so…

translation.en: All the parents are screaming, and I was like this.
translation.de: Alle Eltern schrien, und ich tat so.

translation.en: The FA Cup final.
That's the captain's armband that he wore when he won the FA Cup.
translation.de: Das ist seine Kapitänsbinde vom Sieg beim FA-Cup.

translation.en: And this is the shirt that won that.
translation.de: Und das ist sein Trikot von damals.

translation.en: So here we have,
"This is for you."
Also for me, and here,
"I love you."
How can you not be proud?
translation.de: Wie ist man da nicht stolz?

translation.en: [Tonda] He could have been a world champion with the French team,
translation.de: Er hätte Weltmeister mit den Franzosen sein können,

translation.en: but his father is Gabonese.
It was such an inspiration for me to follow in his footsteps.
translation.de: Es inspirierte mich eben, in seine Fußstapfen zu treten.

translation.en: Whether it is in life or on the pitch.
translation.de: Ob im Leben oder auf dem Feld.

translation.en: Even if we get knocked down,
we get back up and we keep going.
translation.de: wir stehen wieder auf und machen weiter.

translation.en: We're playing for something extraordinary in the end.
translation.de: Wir spielen letztendlich für etwas so Großes.

translation.en: Qualifying for the World Cup, this has never happened for Gabon,
translation.de: Sich für die WM zu qualifizieren ist Gabun noch nie gelungen,

translation.en: and, of course, my father.
Yeah, it pisses me off that we didn't get a result.
The night before, we were all on the same page.
translation.de: Am Abend zuvor waren wir alle auf derselben Höhe.

translation.en: [Pierre-François] We got frustrated. We got frustrated.
We were all over the place, but ultimately, it's up to us.
translation.de: Wir waren chaotisch, aber wir sind natürlich selbst schuld.

translation.en: It was our fault.
We should be difficult to get past.
We've got to be honest. We didn't do that well enough.
translation.de: Wir müssen ehrlich sein. Wir waren einfach nicht gut genug.

translation.en: Look, we've got a match coming up. We just need to put in the practice.
translation.de: Wir haben bald ein Spiel. Wir müssen einfach trainieren.

translation.en: [Tonda] Aubameyang, obviously, is the superstar.
He is the bearer of the Gabonese flag.
If he manages to motivate his young teammates,
translation.de: Wenn er die jungen Teamkollegen motivieren kann,

translation.en: if he can give them enough motivation to qualify,
translation.de: wenn er sie für die Qualifikation überzeugen kann,

translation.en: I think it will be the best gift he will give to his country.
translation.de: dann macht er seinem Land das größte Geschenk.

translation.en: [announcer in English] The best player of the year,
[Modrić in Croatian] All those awards I've received, it's just phenomenal.
translation.de: Ich habe so viele Auszeichnungen bekommen, einfach nur krass.

translation.en: [man] For the last ten years, Ronaldo and Messi shared the Ballon d'Or.
translation.de: In den letzten zehn Jahren haben sich ihn Ronaldo und Messi geteilt.

translation.en: [man] It's you!
[Modrić in Croatian] There's a sadness there, at least for me.
translation.de: Aber es ist etwas traurig, zumindest für mich.

translation.en: [Modrić in Croatian] I think about that final every day.
translation.de: Ich denke jeden Tag an dieses Finale.

translation.en: [Modrić in Croatian] It still has a hold on me.
[in English] ♪ La-la-la-la-la-la, la-la ♪
♪ I've had my share of fame ♪
translation.de: HAT KROATIEN DAS FIFA-WM-FINALE VON 2018 ERREICHT. KAPITÄN LUKA MODRIĆ GEWANN DEN TITEL BESTER SPIELER DES TURNIERS.

translation.en: ♪ You know my name ♪
translation.de: KAPITÄN LUKA MODRIĆ GEWANN DEN TITEL BESTER SPIELER DES TURNIERS.

translation.en: [in Croatian] Let me see how you receive it.
Let's do keepie uppies, the three of us.
Show me some of your tricks.
You're pretty good at this.
The best things never come easy.
translation.de: Die besten Dinge sind nie einfach.

translation.en: Throughout my life and career,
translation.de: Im Leben und in der Karriere

translation.en: nothing has come easy to me.
First.
[man] Luka.
[Modrić] I don't like to talk about it…
…the thing that has marked me for life.
I was small, very small.
I remember some things.
I still remember my grandfather very well.
translation.de: Ich erinnere mich noch gut an meinen Großvater.

translation.en: He was a kind of protector for me.
If I'd been naughty with my mom and dad, he would be there to defend me.
translation.de: Wenn ich meinen Eltern frech kam, hatte er mich verteidigt.

translation.en: He took me everywhere with him.
There were a lot of animals, and he was with them around the clock.
translation.de: Es gab viele Tiere, und er war immer bei ihnen.

translation.en: So when he would take them to graze, he would take me too.
translation.de: Wenn er sie auf die Weide führte, nahm er mich mit.

translation.en: I didn't go to kindergarten.
translation.de: Ich ging nicht in den Kindergarten.

translation.en: I was up at my grandparents' house.
translation.de: Ich blieb bei Oma und Opa.

translation.en: That's where I lived.
I have really lovely memories.
A carefree childhood until…
To be honest, I don't even like to think about this.
translation.de: Ich will eigentlich gar nicht darüber nachdenken.

translation.en: I was very young.
That's what stayed with me the most from my childhood.
translation.de: Daran erinnere ich mich am meisten aus meiner Kindheit.

translation.en: Although I don't like… I don't like to talk about it.
translation.de: Obwohl ich nicht darüber reden will.

translation.en: We had to escape from our home
translation.de: Wir mussten aus unserer Heimat fliehen

translation.en: and go take refuge in hotels.
[Oštrić] We spent six years here.
Luka lived on the third floor, and I lived on the first floor.
translation.de: Luka wohnte in der dritten Etage, ich in der ersten.

translation.en: [Modrić] It wasn't easy to live at that time.
translation.de: Das Leben war damals nicht einfach.

translation.en: You hear those sirens, those bombs dropping, the missiles.
translation.de: Man hörte die Sirenen, Bombenanschläge, Raketen.

translation.en: [Oštrić] It's impossible not to feel fear when that's going on.
translation.de: Es war unmöglich, keine Angst zu haben.

translation.en: [Modrić] When I look at these childhood pictures, I'm always with a ball.
translation.de: Wenn ich die Kinderfotos sehe, habe ich immer einen Ball.

translation.en: You can immediately see
translation.de: Man sieht sofort, dass der Ball bei mir

translation.en: that the ball is going to play an important role in my life.
translation.de: Man sieht sofort, dass der Ball bei mir eine wichtige Rolle spielen würde.

translation.en: Football was definitely a way out
of everything that was going on around us.
We'd use two stones as goalposts
translation.de: Wir hatten zwei Steine als Torpfosten

translation.en: at both ends of the parking lot.
[Modrić] And that's how it all started.
On the tarmac in front of the hotel…
translation.de: Auf dem Asphalt vor einem Hotel,

translation.en: where you got hit and pushed around.
translation.de: wo man hin- und hergeschubst wurde.

translation.en: I was amongst the smaller kids.
translation.de: Ich gehörte zu den kleineren Kindern.

translation.en: There was no complaining or crying.
You would move on and fight for yourself.
translation.de: Man machte weiter und kämpfte für sich.

translation.en: I was named after my grandfather.
I'm sad that he didn't get to see… at least some of what I've achieved.
translation.de: Ich bin traurig, dass er meine Erfolge nicht mehr erleben konnte.

translation.en: But certainly, he's up there looking down on me, cheering me on.
translation.de: Aber er schaut sicher auf mich herab und feuert mich an.

translation.en: And I'm sure he's proud of me.
[Blake in English] We wanna go to the World Cup. We haven't been there since '98.
translation.de: Wir wollen zur WM. Wir waren seit 1998 nicht dabei.

translation.en: [commentator] Victory in Jamaica.
Jamaica has advanced to France '98.
translation.de: Jamaika fährt zur WM 1998 in Frankreich.

translation.en: [Blake in English] I can't even start to imagine,
translation.de: Ich kann mir gar nicht vorstellen,

translation.en: how would it feel for the nation, for the players…
translation.de: was es für das Land, für die Spieler bedeuten würde…

translation.en: [all in Jamaican Patois] We will do!
[Blake in English] …and for me as a captain to be going to the World Cup.
translation.de: Und für mich als Kapitän, wenn wir zur Weltmeisterschaft gehen.

translation.en: What a moment that would be.
translation.de: Was für ein Moment wäre das!

translation.en: What a moment.
[man] When we qualified in 1998,
it was the biggest thing to happen in Jamaica since independence.
translation.de: war das größte Ereignis in Jamaika seit der Unabhängigkeit.

translation.en: They declared a national holiday.
[woman] Results have to improve if we're going to qualify this time.
translation.de: Wir müssen besser werden, um uns diesmal zu qualifizieren.

translation.en: One game, one defeat, and the Reggae Boyz are bottom of the group.
translation.de: Ein Spiel, eine Niederlage, und die Reggae Boyz sind die Letzten.

translation.en: [in Jamaican Patois] '98-- World Cup '98, I was eight.
You were eight? I wasn't even seven then.
translation.de: Du warst acht? Ich war nicht mal sieben.

translation.en: -You were six. -Let's work it out.
-I'm 1990. When were you born? '92? -'94.
You are '94?
In 1998, you were four. You're a baby.
translation.de: Dann warst du 1994 vier. Ein Baby.

translation.en: You were really young, so you probably can't remember that.
translation.de: Sehr jung, deshalb erinnerst du dich nicht.

translation.en: You're DeAndre's age.
I was eight, and I can't even remember much.
translation.de: Ich war acht, ich erinnere mich an wenig.

translation.en: Jamaica used to have one of the best, uh, World Cup songs.
translation.de: Jamaika hatte eins der besten Weltmeisterschaftslieder.

translation.en: -♪ Whoa, whoa, whoa ♪ -Yes.
The song's really hard, ya know?
♪ Rise up ♪
-[laughs] -I…
♪ Stand and take your place ♪
Yes. Yes.
[in English] Winning bringing healing to a nation because you know what it does?
translation.de: Siege heilen die Nation. Weißt du das? Sie bringen Menschen zusammen.

translation.en: It brings the people together.
translation.de: Weißt du das? Sie bringen Menschen zusammen.

translation.en: It unifies them, even if it's for one moment.
translation.de: Sie einen sie, wenn auch nur für einen Moment.

translation.en: It's like, when they win, we all win.
translation.de: Wenn sie gewinnen, gewinnen wir alle.

translation.en: And when they lose, we all lose.
translation.de: Und verlieren sie, verlieren wir mit.

translation.en: ♪ Your journey has just begun ♪
-♪ Rise up ♪ -♪ Rise up ♪ -♪ Stand like the brave ♪ -♪ Oh yeah ♪
[Blake] We have a great group,
but I don't think the group understands yet
translation.de: aber ich glaube nicht, dass es versteht,

translation.en: what it's gonna take to get to a World Cup.
translation.de: was der Weg zur Weltmeisterschaft bedeutet.

translation.en: It's something that I've detected. As a leader, I have to fix.
translation.de: Ich habe das als Anführer erkannt, und ich muss das beheben.

translation.en: If we feel like because we have talent we won't have to work,
translation.de: Wenn wir mit unseren Talenten denken, es kommt uns zugeflogen,

translation.en: we're gonna have a problem.
We have pride for our country.
translation.de: Wir sind stolz auf unser Land.

translation.en: We have pride for our athletes
translation.de: Wir sind stolz auf unsere Sportler,

translation.en: who go out there and actually do their best.
And we know most of them don't come back to no big accolades.
translation.de: Und die meisten bekommen keine großen Auszeichnungen.

translation.en: [Blake] It's one of the most talented groups we've ever had.
translation.de: Wir hatten selten so viel Talent.

translation.en: But if you don't fit the system
or you're not in with what we're about, then I don't think we need you.
translation.de: oder wenn du nicht zu uns passt, dann brauchen wir dich nicht.

translation.en: I would describe this current team as, um,
a mixture of English and Jamaican-born players.
translation.de: als Mischung von Spielern aus England und Jamaika beschreiben.

translation.en: We have 23 guys coming in.
Twenty-three different backgrounds and 23 different egos.
It's hard.
[in Jamaican Patois] This way.
When we have the next one,
if you can, and there's nothing on the left,
translation.de: kannst du ja, wenn links nichts ist,

translation.en: you can pull back and you can press out again.
[Blake in English] I wanna win. And, you know,
if I sense that the unity is not there, you know,
translation.de: Wenn ich merke, wir sind keine Einheit,

translation.en: I tend to get really worried.
[manager] That's it. Let us pray.
As we carry the hopes and dreams of our people,
translation.de: Wir verkörpern die Hoffnungen und Träume unseres Landes.

translation.en: let us understand that our service is first and foremost to our people.
translation.de: Lasst uns unsere Mission als eine vorrangig für unser Volk verstehen.

translation.en: [Blake] You're not gonna be able to beat a good team if you're not together.
translation.de: Man wird kein gutes Team schlagen, wenn man nicht eins ist.

translation.en: Where we are weak, let us be strong.
translation.de: Sind wir schwach, lass uns stark sein.

translation.en: That we will overcome
the many rivers we have to cross.
[man 1 in French] Gabon against Egypt, an important match.
translation.de: Gabun gegen Ägypten, ein wichtiges Spiel.

translation.en: [man 2] Aubameyang in Franceville against Salah. I would never have imagined that.
translation.de: Aubameyang in Franceville gegen Salah, was ich nie gedacht hätte.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
[man 2] The cream of African football.
[Aubameyang] Mohamed Salah… He's a very nice person.
translation.de: Mohamed Salah, er ist sehr nett.

translation.en: We have a very good relationship,
but it's over.
[man 3] We hope national icon Aubameyang can lead us to victory.
translation.de: Wir hoffen, dass uns Aubameyang zum Sieg führen kann.

translation.en: [player] Come, look!
[Pierre-François] Football,
it is a religion for the Gabonese.
translation.de: es ist eine Religion für Gabuner.

translation.en: [player] Yes, that's it!
Football connects ethnicities and communities
because it transcends.
[player] There!
[Tonda] It makes people forget a lot.
If you have problems, you forget them
because the national team is playing.
[reporter 1] Everyone's predicting a win for the Panthers.
translation.de: Alle sagen einen Sieg für die Panther voraus.

translation.en: Are we being too optimistic?
[reporter 2] It's patriotism that is overshadowing realism ahead of this match.
translation.de: Der Patriotismus überschattet vor dem Spiel den Realismus.

translation.en: This moment of fusion in the body of the nation
takes place through the name Aubameyang
translation.de: findet durch den Namen Aubameyang statt.

translation.en: because he is the embodiment of the nation.
[Aubameyang] The people of Gabon are very welcoming.
translation.de: Die Menschen in Gabun sind sehr herzlich.

translation.en: There is a solidarity.
I want to show them that I will do anything for the team.
translation.de: Ich will zeigen, dass ich alles für das Team mache.

translation.en: That they can count on me.
I'm the captain of Gabon.
Representing Africa…
That's why I'm here.
[reporter 1 in English] Greetings, football family.
Happy World Cup qualifiers.
We have got big problems with the Jamaican national team right now.
translation.de: Wir haben derzeit große Probleme im jamaikanischen Team.

translation.en: [reporter 2] We've gambled on some new players
translation.de: Wir haben auf neue Spieler gesetzt,

translation.en: who have only just qualified to play for Jamaica.
translation.de: die sich eben erst für Jamaika qualifiziert haben.

translation.en: [reporter 1] Throwing players together doesn't really work.
translation.de: Man kann nicht einfach Spieler zusammenwürfeln.

translation.en: You have to feel for Andre Blake,
captain of a side who have barely trained together.
translation.de: ist Kapitän eines Teams, das kaum trainiert hat.

translation.en: [Blake] You guys ready to sing later?
[player] I already sang.
[Blake] When new players come in, they have to sing a song.
translation.de: Neue Spieler müssen immer ein Lied singen.

translation.en: That's kind of a way to come together collectively
and to just have some fun.
Tonight, big stage show.
translation.de: Heute Abend ist die große Show.

translation.en: [Marley] Music is so important to sports, you know?
translation.de: Musik ist im Sport wichtig, ja?

translation.en: It's like it kinda… it kinda goes hand in hand.
[player 1] Roofe's ready.
[Roofe] Roofe's not ready, fam.
Roofe says he's opening the show.
[Blake] For me, unity is one of the most important things.
translation.de: Für mich ist Einheit fast das Wichtigste.

translation.en: Sometimes you can tell when that's not there.
translation.de: Man sieht manchmal, wenn sie fehlt.

translation.en: Like I said, don't expect anything good.
Hey, no, it doesn't need to be good, bro.
translation.de: STÜRMER FÜR JAMAIKA Es muss nicht gut sein.

translation.en: They heard about you, eh? [laughs]
translation.de: -Ich singe nicht vor Kameras. -Wissen die von dir?

translation.en: They heard about your big performance tonight.
translation.de: Sie haben von deinem Auftritt heute gehört.

translation.en: [Blake] All right! All right!
-[singing] -[players drumming, exclaiming]
Oh, next!
All the way from England,
Lowe is here to take it.
-[player 1] One word. -[player 2] It's all we're asking for.
[chanting] One word! Word! Word! Word!
♪ Got somebody ♪
Players only!
Remove yourself!
[Blake] The biggest challenge right now going into the World Cup qualifiers
translation.de: Die größte Herausforderung in der Qualifikation ist,

translation.en: is to get this group to play as a team.
[Aubameyang in French] When it's game day, I always have goosebumps.
translation.de: An Spieltagen habe ich immer Gänsehaut.

translation.en: I'm ready to give everything to make the team succeed.
translation.de: Ich will alles geben, damit das Team gewinnt.

translation.en: [Blake in English] I get nervous sometimes.
The bigger the game, the bigger the moment.
translation.de: Je größer das Spiel, desto größer der Moment.

translation.en: [commentator in Croatian] We are live from the Luzhniki Stadium,
the mythical ground of Croatian football.
translation.de: der historische Boden des kroatischen Fußballs.

translation.en: This is where we played the legendary final against the French.
translation.de: Hier haben wir das legendäre Finale gegen die Franzosen gespielt.

translation.en: Memories that will live on forever.
The absence of captain Luka Modrić
has of course worried everyone in the national team.
translation.de: sind alle in der Mannschaft etwas beunruhigt.

translation.en: [Modrić] Unfortunately, because of an injury, I couldn't be with the national team.
translation.de: Leider konnte ich wegen einer Verletzung nicht mitspielen.

translation.en: [commentator] It's clear how much of a blow his absence is for Croatia.
translation.de: Natürlich ist sein Fehlen ein schwerer Schlag für die Kroaten.

translation.en: But as Coach Dalić said ahead of the match,
translation.de: Aber Trainer Dalić sagte vor dem Spiel,

translation.en: Croatia will soon have to face a future without Luka.
translation.de: dass Kroatien schon bald ohne Luka antreten müsse.

translation.en: [Modrić] I'm aware that I'm of a certain age,
translation.de: Natürlich habe ich ein bestimmtes Alter,

translation.en: and that this is my last competition with the Croatian national team.
translation.de: und das ist mein letztes Turnier mit der kroatischen Mannschaft.

translation.en: Come here.
[in English] Who's playing, Sofi?
[in Croatian] Who's playing?
Who's playing?
Who's playing?
Is it Croatia? Huh?
-Croatia. -Croatia.
What do you think the score will be?
-Two-one. -Two-one.
-[Sofia in English] Daddy! -[in Croatian] Is it a regular game?
translation.de: Papa! Ist es ein normales Spiel?

translation.en: What do you mean?
[in English] Friendly. Friendly. -Huh? -Friendly.
[in Croatian] No, these are the World Cup qualifiers.
translation.de: Nein, ein Qualifikationsspiel für die WM.

translation.en: -Yes. For Qatar. -Then we have to win.
Of course, if it were a friendly…
[in English] Sofi, we have to win.
[in Croatian] Yes, this is for the World Cup.
translation.de: Ja, das ist für die WM.

translation.en: Who is the captain when you don't play?
-[boy] Perišić. -Perišić.
[girl] Who is the captain when Perišić or you aren't playing?
translation.de: Wer ist Kapitän, wenn du und Perišić nicht mitspielen?

translation.en: [Modrić] Lovren or Vida.
Is Vida playing?
No, he has yellow cards, so he can't.
translation.de: Nein, er hat gelbe Karten. Er kann nicht.

translation.en: -Two? -Yes, two.
Was he angry?
[exhales] Yes, very.
-[in English] Give me the ball. -[Sofia] It's my ball.
No, it's my ball.
-[Sofia] No, it's mine. -It's my ball.
It's my ball, yes.
-Ema's ball. -My ball.
-[Sofia] Hey, share. -Share. Okay.
You didn't share with me.
Yes, she always shares.
[Modrić in Croatian] It's hard for me when I'm not with the national team.
translation.de: Es ist schwierig, nicht beim Team zu sein.

translation.en: [in French] Are we ready?
[reporter] Only five African teams will qualify for Qatar 2022.
translation.de: Nur fünf Teams aus Afrika qualifizieren sich für Katar 2022.

translation.en: Egypt are the big favorites here in Franceville.
translation.de: Ägypten ist der große Favorit hier in Franceville.

translation.en: Can Aubameyang's men cause an upset tonight
and reignite their campaign against this talented Egypt side
translation.de: und ihre Siegesserie gegen die talentierten Ägypter starten,

translation.en: led by the incomparable Mohamed Salah?
[in English] Rock, paper, scissors, shoot!
[reporter 1 in Jamaican Patois] If Jamaica wins today,
we are back into the thick of things. Right?
translation.de: sind wir wieder im Spiel, oder?

translation.en: [reporter 2] We just have to make sure that we get the ball to whoever's up top
translation.de: Wir müssen nur den Ball dem geben, der vorne ist,

translation.en: to put into the back of the net.
Andre Blake doing his best, letting none go in.
translation.de: Andre Blake gibt sein Bestes, er lässt keinen rein.

translation.en: [reporter 1 in English] Jamaica will win this game. I feel it.
translation.de: Jamaika wird gewinnen. Ich weiß es.

translation.en: [Blake] Wearing the captain's band,
you can't show your teammates certain things.
translation.de: kann man seinen Kollegen manches nicht zeigen.

translation.en: They're looking to you,
so you can't show fear,
you can't show nerves.
[in Croatian] When you watch the game, are you nervous or not?
translation.de: Wenn du das Spiel siehst, bist du dann nervös?

translation.en: Are you nervous or not?
Do you think we'll win?
Sometimes.
[Modrić] When you're watching on TV, it's really nerve-racking.
translation.de: Im Fernsehen zehrt es krass an den Nerven.

translation.en: You get much more nervous than when you play.
translation.de: Man ist viel nervöser, als wenn man spielt.

translation.en: [commentator] Now the real fight starts.
translation.de: Jetzt beginnt der echte Kampf. KROATIEN - 6 RUSSLAND - 6

translation.en: Tonight against Russia, it couldn't be harder.
translation.de: Heute gegen Russland, schlimmer geht es nicht.

translation.en: [in French] Every ball, every minute, we give everything, boys. Everything.
translation.de: Jeder Ball, jede Minute, wir geben alles, Jungs.

translation.en: Nobody gives up.
[Blake in English] Out in eight, gents. Get yourself ready.
translation.de: In acht Minuten, Männer. Macht euch fertig.

translation.en: [man in French] Strong, guys.
[Aubameyang] Together!
Right until the end. Come on!
[Blake in Jamaican Patois] Now! Let's go!
[in French] It's a World Cup qualifier. Don't forget that. Keep it in mind.
Let's give everything. We can do it. Come on!
translation.de: Geben wir alles. Wir schaffen das.

translation.en: [all chanting in Jamaican Patois] We will do! We will do! Jamaica!
[in French] Come on, boys!
[Blake in English] As a group, how hard are we willing to work?
translation.de: Wie hart wollen wir als Gruppe arbeiten?

translation.en: How much are we willing to suffer?
You're talking about the World Cup.
[commentator in French] Welcome to Franceville for the match
between the Panthers and the Pharaohs.
Gabon versus Egypt.
[Aubameyang] Everyone always expects the most from you.
translation.de: Alle erwarten immer das Beste von dir.

translation.en: When we're in the tunnel,
it's a very special moment.
You see the pitch, and you can't wait to get out there.
translation.de: Man sieht das Spielfeld und will einfach raus.

translation.en: [commentator] Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, the captain.
The Panthers will rely on him a lot today.
translation.de: Die Panther werden ihn heute brauchen.

translation.en: [Sofia in English] One, two! One, two, three!
[commentator in Croatian] Russia, our opponents tonight, are the toughest team in the group.
translation.de: Unser Gegner des Abends, Russland, ist das härteste Team der Gruppe.

translation.en: [commentator in French] Here we go. The kick-off whistle.
[Aubameyang] I think we have a lot of potential.
translation.de: Ich denke, wir haben viel Potenzial.

translation.en: I've always said it.
I think it's the best generation I've ever known.
translation.de: Es ist die beste Generation, die ich kenne.

translation.en: [commentator in English] Panama will get things underway.
translation.de: JAMAIKA GEGEN PANAMA QUALIFIKATION NORD-/MITTELAMERIKA Panama legt los. Sie kicken von links nach rechts.

translation.en: We're kicking from left to right.
translation.de: Panama legt los. Sie kicken von links nach rechts.

translation.en: [commentator in Croatian] Without Modrić today,
translation.de: Heute ist Kapitän Modrić nicht dabei,

translation.en: Perišić accepts the task of captaincy.
Miranchuk. He's a very dangerous player.
He shoots. It's gone over the bar.
Close him down.
[commentator in English] Jamaica trying to build from their half.
translation.de: Jamaika baut sich in der eigenen Hälfte auf.

translation.en: We're getting pushed back so deep!
[commentator] Jamaica giving away possession.
Panama on the attack, puts the play on the left-hand side
translation.de: Panama greift an, spielt mehr linksseitig,

translation.en: right down to Rodriguez.
A shot! And right to goalkeeper Blake, diving to his right.
translation.de: Schuss! Und rechts von Torwart Blake, er hechtet nach rechts.

translation.en: [Blake] We couldn't put five passes together.
It was just chaotic.
[commentator] Panama on the attack. What a strike!
translation.de: Panama greift an. Was für ein Schuss!

translation.en: [Blake] There was no cohesiveness. There was no chemistry.
translation.de: Es gab keinen Zusammenhalt, es gab keine Chemie.

translation.en: [commentator in Croatian] A chance for Croatia.
Perišić. It wasn't a great shot. It surprised him.
translation.de: Perišić. Kein guter Schuss. Das hat ihn überrascht.

translation.en: [commentator in French] Mohamed Salah has magnificent control.
translation.de: Mohamed Salah zaubert mit dem Ball.

translation.en: A fantastic pass there.
Now, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang.
A goal. No! The save from El Shenawy.
translation.de: Ein Tor. Nein! Von El Shenawy abgewehrt.

translation.en: I was sure that was a goal.
[commentator in English] Forward again. Here comes Panama. Floats the ball inside the penalty area.
translation.de: Wieder Angriff, hier kommt Panama. Der Ball ist im Strafraum.

translation.en: Header! Beautiful header!
[Blake] After the second goal…
[commentator] Oh my word!
[Blake] …"Am I dreaming? Is this happening for real?"
"Will somebody wake me up?"
[commentator] The visitors, they're leading by two goals to nil.
translation.de: Die Gäste führen zwei zu null.

translation.en: [commentator in French] Nil-nil between Gabon and Egypt.
translation.de: Null zu null bei Gabun gegen Ägypten.

translation.en: [commentator in Croatian] Croatia have had more possession but have done nothing with it.
translation.de: Kroatien hatte mehr Ballbesitz, aber diesen nicht genutzt.

translation.en: [commentator in English] Coach Tappa Whitmore of the Jamaica team has to make some changes
translation.de: Trainer Tappa Whitmore der Jamaikaner muss etwas ändern.

translation.en: because Panama, they're all over the Jamaicans at the present time.
translation.de: Panama überrollt die Jamaikaner ja geradezu.

translation.en: [player 1] To me, I think we should start by pressing them.
translation.de: Wir sollten sie unter Druck setzen.

translation.en: We're at home. We're down 2-0. We need to chase the game.
translation.de: Es steht zwei zu null zu Hause. Wir müssen Druck machen.

translation.en: We need a structure of pressing them. We go, we get picked off.
translation.de: Wir brauchen Struktur. Sonst werden zerlegt.

translation.en: [player 2] It's not structure.
Need to change formation. We're too open in midfield.
translation.de: Formation ändern. Du bist im Mittelfeld zu offen.

translation.en: -We need someone in the midfield. -[coach] Stop talking.
translation.de: MITTELFELD VON JAMAIKA -Wir brauchen wen im Mittelfeld. -Ruhe.

translation.en: Before you talk about formation, before you talk about anything, right?
translation.de: Bevor du über die Aufstellung oder so sprichst,

translation.en: They're outfighting us.
They're quicker to the ball.
They are quicker to the second balls, guys.
translation.de: Sie sind schneller am Pass, Leute.

translation.en: Right? We're pressing and just jogging up to the ball.
translation.de: Wir machen Druck und joggen zum Ball.

translation.en: It's like a testimonial!
What is that all about? They're moving quicker than us.
translation.de: Was ist denn los? Sie sind schneller als wir.

translation.en: We are at home!
We are at home. You can do any formation you want.
translation.de: Wir sind zu Hause. Da hilft keine Aufstellung.

translation.en: They run faster, quicker than you, guess what?
translation.de: Sie sind schneller als ihr. Und?

translation.en: We get beat.
Come on. Come on.
[in French] We give it all until the end.
If you're tired, come off and the subs give everything too.
translation.de: Wenn du müde bist, dann übernehmen andere für dich.

translation.en: -We're in the game, boys. -[man] We're in the game.
We're in it.
[in English] They need to think this is a cauldron, and it's too hot.
translation.de: Sie müssen glauben, dass es für sie brenzlig wird.

translation.en: Somebody take some leadership.
Somebody just take the game by the scruff of the neck and go.
translation.de: Jemand muss das Spiel jetzt so richtig anpacken.

translation.en: [in French] It's time to score, guys. We are hungry.
translation.de: Zeit für Tore, Leute. Wir sind hungrig.

translation.en: Come on, guys.
-[whistle blows] -[tense music plays]
[commentator] There is nothing between these two teams despite the Panthers' dominance.
translation.de: Von den beiden Teams dominieren die Panther.

translation.en: And here we have Boupendza.
One-on-one with Mohamed El Shenawy.
translation.de: Ein Duell mit Mohamed El Shenawy.

translation.en: [Aubameyang] We had a great game, a great game,
and we are rewarded.
[commentator] What's going on? What's going on?
Oh, it's a red card.
[Aubameyang] Of course, that gives us that extra energy, and it gives you hope.
translation.de: Natürlich, das gibt uns diese Energie, und es gibt uns Hoffnung.

translation.en: So it was the moment to take points off them.
translation.de: Das war der Moment, Punkte abzusahnen.

translation.en: [in Jamaican Patois] Move up! Move up! Move up!
[in English] At 2-0, are we still in the game? At least to get a point.
translation.de: Sind wir noch im Spiel? Wenigstens einen Punkt.

translation.en: I do feel, um, somewhat distant as the goalkeeper.
translation.de: Als Torhüter fühle ich mich etwas distanzierter.

translation.en: And it can be very frustrating, you know? Especially whenever I get scored on.
translation.de: Und das kann frustrierend sein. Besonders wenn ich Tore zulasse.

translation.en: [commentator] Waterman, he dances,
and beats the goalkeeper, Blake, to his left.
Oh my word.
That's cherry on the top, icing on the cake.
translation.de: Das ist jetzt die Krönung, das Sahnehäubchen.

translation.en: [Blake] That was like the dagger. That's it.
translation.de: Das war wie ein Dolch. Es ist vorbei.

translation.en: [commentator in Croatian] Ivanušec enters the box. Ivanušec shoots.
translation.de: Ivanušec ist im Strafraum. Ivanušec schießt.

translation.en: Man, we're five times better than them. Come on.
translation.de: Mann, wir sind fünfmal besser als sie. Na los.

translation.en: [commentator in French] It's Obiang. One-two.
He's in the penalty area.
They shoot and they score!
The Panthers claw the Egyptian Pharaohs.
translation.de: Die Panther zeigen es den Pharaonen.

translation.en: -One-zero. -[fans cheering, applauding]
[in Croatian] Clear it away.
Clear it!
What are you doing?
[commentator] Kovačić. Kovačić! What an opportunity, but it's wide.
translation.de: Kovačić! Was für eine Chance. Aber daneben.

translation.en: [commentator] If that had gone in, Croatia would be celebrating at the Luzhniki Stadium.
translation.de: Hätte es geklappt, hätten die Kroaten im Luschniki gefeiert.

translation.en: [commentator in English] And that signals the end of the matchup.
translation.de: Und das ist das Ende des Spiels.

translation.en: Captain Blake looks dejected.
[Blake] It could have easily been 6-0.
We didn't fight hard enough. We didn't show enough character.
translation.de: Wir kämpften nicht genug. Wir hatten nicht genug Mumm. JAMAIKA 0 - 3 PANAMA ENDSTAND

translation.en: [in Croatian] Well, a point is not bad if we beat Slovakia and Slovenia.
translation.de: Ein Punkt ist nicht schlecht, wenn wir Slowakei und Slowenien besiegen.

translation.en: [Aubameyang in French] I don't think I've ever seen Gabon play so well.
translation.de: Ich habe Gabun noch nie so gut spielen gesehen.

translation.en: We started to believe.
[commentator] We're in the last minutes of this match.
translation.de: Wir sind in der letzten Minute.

translation.en: The final push.
Aubameyang is full of fighting spirit.
[Aubameyang] It was a strange game.
[commentator] A victory here would give them a chance in the group after the defeat to Libya.
translation.de: Ein Sieg würde eine Chance in der Gruppe bedeuten.

translation.en: [Aubameyang] At that moment, we were on the right path.
translation.de: In dem Moment waren wir auf dem richtigen Weg.

translation.en: But…
you have to be focused.
Every detail counts until the last second.
translation.de: Jedes Detail zählt bis zur letzten Sekunde.

translation.en: [commentator] Attention. Watch out.
